name: For the love of God
summary: For the Love of god, git gud! Looks can be deceiving.  Block incoming enemy attacks at the right moment, at the right spot. Strike them down after blocking their attacks. It's all about the timing and hand position.  Solve puzzles mid-combat using projectile reflection. Defeat the monsters and reach the boss. All you have is a magic shield, a sword, and your eagle eyes.  Test your skills with souls like combat reimagined for VR.
